content: Yes, you are absolutely correct. Support is vital. And here every human being can play a role. We can be the support we desire for ourselves. Plus in your write-up you talked so correctly about empathy. If that one simple quality can come in our character, we will surely end up making a very meaningful difference in someone’s life, somewhere. And every time we are able to do that, we find we have made a difference to our life. Look forward to your write-up on EMDR.
